comments.body: You can a line here with `script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt` and remove both `bld.bat` and `build.sh` files.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@
build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
